title: A Nice place to be (TEFC)
creator_credit: La Trobe University. Centre for the Study of Educational Communication and Media, Patricia Edgar and Dave McRae
brief_description: Looks at the aims and problems of the Sydney Road Community School, an alternative community school in Melbourne, and the nature of the experiment undertaken there. Each child is allowed to choose which subjects he wishes to take and which class he goes into with a particular teacher.
